title: 50 - The Golden Anniversary Episode
description: Rock, paper, scissors... it's My Favorite Murder! On this episode, Karen and Georgia delve into the mystery of the Somerton Man and discuss the 1984 bioterror attack by followers of the Bhagwan Shree Rajneesh.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
